Description: gram, a unit of mass in the International System of Units equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
kilogram,  the base unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI).
(avoirdupois) pound, a unit of mass used in both the British imperial and United States customary systems of measurement.
(avoirdupois) ounce, a unit of mass, 1/16 of a lb, uses in the United States.
